name: flow-remove-types
description: Removes Flow type annotations from JavaScript files with speed and simplicity.
author: Lee Byron <lee@leebyron.com> (http://leebyron.com/)

scripts.test: DIFF=$(./flow-remove-types test/source.js | diff test/expected.js -); if [ -n "$DIFF" ]; then echo "$DIFF"; exit 1; fi; DIFF=$(./flow-remove-types -p test/source.js | diff test/expected-pretty.js -); if [ -n "$DIFF" ]; then echo "$DIFF"; exit 1; fi; DIFF=$(./flow-remove-types -p -m test/source.js | diff test/expected-pretty.js.map -); if [ -n "$DIFF" ]; then echo "$DIFF"; exit 1; fi; RES=$(node -e 'require("./register");require("./test/test-node-module.js")'); if [ "$RES" != 42 ]; then echo 'Node register hook failed'; exit 1; fi; FLOW_NODE=$(./flow-node ./test/test-node-module.js); if [ "$FLOW_NODE" != 42 ]; then echo 'flow-node failed'; exit 1; fi;
scripts.test-update: ./flow-remove-types test/source.js > test/expected.js; ./flow-remove-types -p test/source.js > test/expected-pretty.js; ./flow-remove-types -p -m test/source.js > test/expected-pretty.js.map
